Super Crome: Bullet Purgatory Stumphead Games has announced that its sophomore title, Super Crome: Bullet Purgatory , will blast into Early Access on PC and Mac in Q1 2019.

FighterZ Tournament is a new, online tournament mode featuring various new match rules, culminating in a final 8-player bracket.
The winners and runners-up in each tournament will receive special rewards and Z Trophies, the latter of which players can display in their all-new Z Trophy Room.
